LanguageData.Mutant_Ogre.label: ogre
LanguageData.Mutant_Ogre.description: Originally designed for construction and heavy industry, the Ogron is a large, tough, thickheaded xenohuman. In rimworld condition, Many feral clans use them as brutal war beasts.
LanguageData.Mutant_Ogre_Leather.label: ogreskin
LanguageData.Mutant_Ogre_Corpse.label: ogre corpse
LanguageData.Mutant_OgreOgrenaut.label: ogre
LanguageData.Mutant_OgreOgrenaut.description: Originally designed for construction and heavy industry, the Ogron�� is a large, tough, thickheaded xenohuman. In rimworld condition, Many feral clans use them as brutal war beasts.
LanguageData.Mutant_OgreOgrenaut_Leather.label: ogreskin
LanguageData.Mutant_OgreOgrenaut_Corpse.label: ogre corpse
LanguageData.Mutant_OgreHellmaker.label: ogre
LanguageData.Mutant_OgreHellmaker.description: Originally designed for construction and heavy industry, the Ogron�� is a large, tough, thickheaded xenohuman. In rimworld condition, Many feral clans use them as brutal war beasts.
LanguageData.Mutant_OgreHellmaker_Leather.label: ogreskin
LanguageData.Mutant_OgreHellmaker_Corpse.label: ogre corpse
LanguageData.Mutant_Razortooth.label: razortooth
LanguageData.Mutant_Razortooth.description: Chomper, dust leaper, skull ripper, this creature has been living in many other planets, so it has many different names. As you can imagine from the name, razortooth are extremely dangerous creatures. Well developed dual-jawed mouth, exceptional intelligence and ferocious behavior makes them alpha predator in any environment. Many feral warlords use them as some kind of warhound.
LanguageData.Mutant_Razortooth_Leather.label: razortooth leather
LanguageData.Mutant_Razortooth_Meat.label: razortooth meat
LanguageData.Mutant_Razortooth_Corpse.label: razortooth corpse
LanguageData.Mutant_Twisted.label: twisted
LanguageData.Mutant_Twisted.description: Growing vats are delicate equipment. Without proper maintenance for many years, vats will be contaminated and cause malfunctions. From these contaminated Vats, Ferals breed their wicked slaves. These slaves fight desperately. Because death is the only way to be free from their terrible fate.
LanguageData.Mutant_Twisted_Leather.label: twisted skin
LanguageData.Mutant_Twisted_Corpse.label: twisted corpse
LanguageData.Mutant_Shadark.label: shadark
LanguageData.Mutant_Shadark.description: Lurking in the shadows of the woods, the shadarks are creatures of darkness. Assumed as some sort of xenohuman experiment's failure, their nature is hideous and insidious. The shadark's most horrifying feature is an ability of shooting symbiont spores. While the thick cloud of spores still remains, they take confused prey by surprise. They usually found in the feral raiding party, waiting for a chance to take dead bodies.
LanguageData.Mutant_Shadark_Leather.label: shadeskin
LanguageData.Mutant_Shadark_Corpse.label: shadark corpse
